bibliography:
Āryadeva, Four Hundred Verses
(Catuḥśataka, tsha 1b–18a), Sde dge edition
of the Bstan ‘gyur, Dharmasala: Paljor Press, 1998. For
Gyel-tsap's full commentary in Enlish translation see 
Geshe Sonam Rinchen, 2008,  Āryadeva's Four Hundrded
    Stanzas on the Middle Way, Ruth Sonam (trans.), Ithaca, New York: Snow Lion Publications.

the translations of the first four chapters are included in 
Lang, Karen, 2003,  Four Illusions: Candrakīrti's Advices
    to Travelers on the Bodhisattva Path, 
  Oxford: Oxford University Press.

Geshe Sonam Rinchen, 2008,  Āryadeva's Four Hundrded
    Stanzas on the Middle Way, Ruth Sonam (trans.), Ithaca, New York: Snow Lion Publications.

Lang, Karen, 2003,  Four Illusions: Candrakīrti's Advices
    to Travelers on the Bodhisattva Path, 
  Oxford: Oxford University Press.

Bhāvavevika, [MadhHK],
Madhyamakahṛdayakārikā (Dbu ma snying
po'i tshig l'hur byas pa). Dbu ma dza 1a–40b), Sde dge
edition of the Bstan ‘gyur, Dharmasala: Paljor Press, 1998.

–––,
Madhyamakahṛdayavṛtti-tarkajvālā
(Dbu ma snying po'i ‘grel pa rtog ge ‘bar ba).
Dbu ma dza 40b–396b), Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur,
Dharmasala: Paljor Press, 1998.

–––, Madhyamakaratnapradīpa (Dbu ma
rin po che'i sgron ma), Sde dge bstan ‘gyur, Dbu ma tsha
259b–289a), Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur,
Dharmasala: Paljor Press, 1998.

–––, [PPMV],
Prajñāpradīpamūlamadhyamakav ṛtti
(Dbu ma rtsa ba'i ‘grel ba shes rab sgron ma. Dbu ma
tsha 45b–259b), Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur,
Dharmasala: Paljor Press, 1998.

Buddhapālita,
Buddhapālitamūlamadhyamakavṛtti. (Dbu
ma tsa 158b–281a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan
‘gyur. Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998. A good portion of this
text is translated from Tibetan into English by Akira Saito and
included in his unpublished thesis:
Saito, Akira, 1984, A Study of the
Buddhapālita-Mūlamadhyamakakārikā-vṛtti,
Ph.D. thesis, Australian National University.
[Saito 1984
available online]

Saito, Akira, 1984, A Study of the
Buddhapālita-Mūlamadhyamakakārikā-vṛtti,
Ph.D. thesis, Australian National University.
[Saito 1984
available online]

Candrakīrti, [M], An Introduction on Madhyamaka
(Madhyamakāvatāra. Dbu ma ‘a
201b–219a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur.
Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998.

–––, [PP], Clear-word Commentary on the
Fundamental Verses of the Middle Way
(Mūlamadhyamakavṛttiprasannapadā. Dbu ma
‘a 1b–200a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur.
Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998. This text received a good deal of
attention from academic studies. For partial English translations see
Sprung, M., 1979, Lucid Exposition of the Middle Way: The Essential Chapters
from the Prasannapadā of Candrakīrti, London: Routledge 
and Kegan Paul. 
Arnold, D., 2005, “Materials for a Mādhyamika Critique
of Foundationalism: An Annotated Translation of Prasannapadā
55.11 to 75.13”, Journal of International Association of
    Buddhist Studies,  28(2): 411–467. 
de Jong,  J.W.,  1978, “Textcritical Notes
on the Prasannapadā”, Indo-Iranian Journal, 20(1):
  25–59 and 20(3): 217–252. doi:10.1007/BF00167750 and doi:10.1007/BF00158041 
MacDonald, A., 2015, In Clear Words: The Prasannapadā, Chapter One, Vol.
II: Annotated Translation, Tibetan Text, Wien: OAW.

Sprung, M., 1979, Lucid Exposition of the Middle Way: The Essential Chapters
from the Prasannapadā of Candrakīrti, London: Routledge 
and Kegan Paul.

Arnold, D., 2005, “Materials for a Mādhyamika Critique
of Foundationalism: An Annotated Translation of Prasannapadā
55.11 to 75.13”, Journal of International Association of
    Buddhist Studies,  28(2): 411–467.

de Jong,  J.W.,  1978, “Textcritical Notes
on the Prasannapadā”, Indo-Iranian Journal, 20(1):
  25–59 and 20(3): 217–252. doi:10.1007/BF00167750 and doi:10.1007/BF00158041

MacDonald, A., 2015, In Clear Words: The Prasannapadā, Chapter One, Vol.
II: Annotated Translation, Tibetan Text, Wien: OAW.

–––, Commentary on Seventy Verses on
Emptiness (Śūnayatāsaptativṛtti,
Dbu ma tsa 110a–121a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan
‘gyur. Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998.

–––, Commentary on Sixty Verses on Reasoning
(Yuktiṣaṣṭhikavṛtii, Dbu ma
ya 1b–30b). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur.
Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998.

–––, Commentary on the Four Hundred Verses
(Catuḥṣatakaṭika. Dbu ma ya 30b–239a).
Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur. Dharmasala: Paljor Press.
1998. The first four chapters of Candrakīrti's commentary are now
available in English, see 
Lang, Karen, 2003,  Four Illusions:
Candrakīrti's Advice for Travelers on the Bodhisattva Path,
  New York: Oxford University Press.

for a full commentary by Gyeltsap see 
Geshe Sonam Rinchen, 2008, Āryadeva's Four Hundred Stanzas on the Middle Way with
  Commentary by Gyeltsap,  Ruth Sonam (trans.), Ithaca, New York: Snow Lion Publications.

Lang, Karen, 2003,  Four Illusions:
Candrakīrti's Advice for Travelers on the Bodhisattva Path,
  New York: Oxford University Press.

Geshe Sonam Rinchen, 2008, Āryadeva's Four Hundred Stanzas on the Middle Way with
  Commentary by Gyeltsap,  Ruth Sonam (trans.), Ithaca, New York: Snow Lion Publications.

–––, [MBh], Commentary on the Introduction on
Madhyamaka (Madhyamakāvatārabhāśya.
Dbu ma ‘a 220b–348a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan
‘gyur. Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998.

–––, Discussion on the Five Aggregates
(Pañcaskandhaprakaraṇa, Dbu ma ya
239b–266b). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur.
Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998.

Dharmakīrti, Ascertainment of Right-cognition

152b–230a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur.
Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998.

–––, [PVT], Commentary on the Verses of
Right-cognition
(Pramāṇavārttikavṛtti, tshad
ma ce 261b–365a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur.

–––, Dose of Logical Reasoning
(Nyāyabindu, tshad ma ce 231b–238a). Sde

1998.

–––, [PVK], Verses on Right-cognition
(Pramāṇavārttikakārikā, tshad

Dharmottara, Nyābinduṭīkā (Tshad
ma we 36b–92a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur.
Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998.

Dignāga, [ĀlamPV], Investigation About the Support of
the Cognition
(Ālambanaparīkṣāvṛtti). Sde dge
edition of the Bstan ‘gyur. Dharmasala: Paljor Press, 1998. The
translation of Dignāga's text is included in two contemporary
works: 
Tola, F. and C. Dragonetti, 2004, Being as Consciousness:
Yogācāra Philosophy of Buddhism, Delhi: Motilal
Banarsidass Publishers.
 Duckworth, D., M.D. Eckel, J.L. Garfield, J. Powers, Y. Thabkhas,
  and S. Thakchoe, 2016,  Dignāga's Investigation of the Percept: A Philosophical
Legacy in India and Tibet, New York: Oxford University Press.

Tola, F. and C. Dragonetti, 2004, Being as Consciousness:
Yogācāra Philosophy of Buddhism, Delhi: Motilal
Banarsidass Publishers.

Duckworth, D., M.D. Eckel, J.L. Garfield, J. Powers, Y. Thabkhas,
  and S. Thakchoe, 2016,  Dignāga's Investigation of the Percept: A Philosophical
Legacy in India and Tibet, New York: Oxford University Press.

–––, Auto-commentary on the Compendium of
Right-cognition (Pramāṇasamuccayavṛtti,
Tshad ma ce 14b–85b). Sde dge edition of the Bstan

–––, Compendium of Right-cognition
(Pramāṇasamuccaya, Tshad ma ce
1b–13a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur. Dharmasala:

Madhyamakāloka (Restored Sansktrit Text from the Tibetan

Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998.

–––, Establishing the Non-intrinsic Reality

–––, Stages of Meditation

–––, Separation of the Middle From
Extremes (Madhyāntavibhaṅgakārika, Sems
tsam phi 50b–53b). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur.
Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998.

Nāgārjuna, Commentary on the Verse Rebutting the
Disputes (Vigrahavyāvartanīvṛtti, Vig Dbu ma tsa
121a–137a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur.
Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998. For English translations of this text
see 
 Kamaleswar, B., E.H.  Johnson,  and A. Kunst, 2002, The Dialectical
Method of Nāgārjuna: Vigrahavyāvartanī, New
Delhi: Motilal Banarsidass Publishers.
 Westerhoff, Jan, 2010, The
Dispeller of Disputes: Nāgārjuna's
Vigrahavyāvartanī. New York: Oxford University Press.

Kamaleswar, B., E.H.  Johnson,  and A. Kunst, 2002, The Dialectical
Method of Nāgārjuna: Vigrahavyāvartanī, New
Delhi: Motilal Banarsidass Publishers.

Westerhoff, Jan, 2010, The
Dispeller of Disputes: Nāgārjuna's
Vigrahavyāvartanī. New York: Oxford University Press.

–––, [MMK], Fundamental Verses of the Middle
Way (Mūlamadhyamakakārikā, Dbu ma tsa
1b–19a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur. Dharmasala:
Paljor Press. 1998. For commentaries in English translations, see
Siderits, M. and S. Katsura, 2013,  Nāgārjuna's Middle Way:
Mūlamadhyamakakārikā, Boston: Wisdom Publications.
Garfield, J. and N. Geshe Samten, 2006, Ocean of Reasoning: A Great

Mūlamadhyamakākarikā, New York: Oxford University
Press.

Siderits, M. and S. Katsura, 2013,  Nāgārjuna's Middle Way:
Mūlamadhyamakakārikā, Boston: Wisdom Publications.

Garfield, J. and N. Geshe Samten, 2006, Ocean of Reasoning: A Great
Commentary on Nāgārjuna's
Mūlamadhyamakākarikā, New York: Oxford University
Press.

–––, Seventy Verses on Emptiness
(Śūnyatāsaptatikārikā. Dbu ma
tsa 24a–27a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur.
Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998. An English translation of the text is
included in Lindtner 1997: 94-120. For Geshe Sonam Rinchen's
commentary on this text in English see Komito 1999.

–––, Sixty Verses on Reasoning
(Yuktiṣaṣṭhikākārikā,
Dbu ma tsa 20b–22b). Sde dge edition of the Bstan
‘gyur. Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998. For Candrakīrti's
commentary translated from the Tibetan with introductory study and
annotation by Joseph John Loizzo and the AIBS translation team see
Loizzo, Nāgārjuna's Reason Sixty with Candrakīrti's
Commentary, New York: Columbia University Press. 2007.

–––, Verses Rebutting the Disputes
(Vigrahavyāvartanīkārikā, Dbu ma tsa
27a–29a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur. Dharmasala:
Paljor Press. 1998.

Śāntarakṣita, Commentary on the Distinguishing
the Two Truths (Satyadvayavibhaṅgapañjikā
Dbu ma sa 15b–52b). Sde dge edition of the Bstan
‘gyur. Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998.

–––, [MAV], Commentary on the Ornament
of the Middle Way
(Madhyamakālaṁkāravṛtti Dbu ma sa
56b–84a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur. Dharmasala:
Paljor Press. 1998.

–––, [MAK], Ornament of the Middle
Way (Madhyamakālaṁkārakārikā
Dbu ma sa 53a–56b). Sde dge edition of the Bstan
‘gyur. Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998.

Sthiramati, [TriṃB], Commentary on the Thirty Verses
(Triṃśikābhāṣya, Sems
tsam),Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur. Dharmasala:
Paljor Press. 1998.

1988–1990, Abhidharmakośabhāṣyam of

1988–1990, Abhidharmakośabhāṣyam of

Viṃśakārikāvṛtti, Sems

Anaker, S.,  2005, Seven Works of Vasubandhu: The Buddhist

16–17). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur. Dharmasala:

–––, [TSN], The Discernment of the Three Natures

translations of this text is included in Anacker  2005: 287–299.

–––, The Thirty Verses
(Triṃśikā kārikā Triṃ; Sem
tsam shi 1a–3a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur.
Dharmasala: Paljor Press. 1998. For an English translations of the
verses see Anacker 2005: 181–191.

–––, [AK], Treasury of Knowledge

1b–25a). Sde dge edition of the Bstan ‘gyur. Dharmasala:

–––, The Twenty Verses
